explains: vi. 逗弄人；令人干着急

sentences.en: The meaning of the verb tantalize is a very particular one, "to promise or show something desirable to a person and then take it away; to tease by arousing hope."
sentences.cn: 动词 tantalize 的意思非常特殊：“承诺或展示某人想要的东西，然后把它拿走；通过唤起希望来挑逗。”

sentences.en: Give the dog the bone don't tantalize him.
sentences.cn: 把那块骨头给那条狗吧——别让它干着急了。

sentences.en: Give the dog the bone do not tantalize him.
sentences.cn: 把那块骨头给那条狗吧——别让它干着急了。
